resources.string: TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR USE, REPRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION
Your GPS function is not turned on
The notification appears when a user is near a sight with the tour running

After opening het app you will get to see the map of Breda. When you select the icon with the three horizontal stripes, you will get to see a menu. In this menu you have a choice between the possible routes that you can walk. 
After you have chosen one of these routes, you can walk them. If you select the menu icon while walking the tour, you will find a list of the sight that are along the route. When you select on of these sights, you can view the detailed information, pictures and videos. It is also possible to view this information by selecting one of the sight-markers. 
As you walk, the part of the route that you have walked will be visibly marked. When you come within the 25 meter zone of a sight, you will receive a notification informing you that you are near a sight. if you tap on the notification, you can vies the information of this sight. 
If you stray form the tour, the app will give the directions to return to the tour.
